ModMetaData.name: Always Very Fertile
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod was made by the request of someone who wanted to stick up the biggest middle finger possible to biology, because the middle finger I made in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2982757714]Always Fertile[/url] was, objectively speaking, not the biggest finger possible. Well with this mod age truly is just a number. This makes fertility age factor stay at 100% until the pawn's death, and even afterwards if you revive the pawn.
Looking for more options on fertility? Check out my [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2974206359]Fertility Genes[/url] mod. It adds a lot of extra options beyond the normal 3.
